head.title: An Online Guide to Your Neighborhood Wildlife

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: An Online Guide to Your Neighborhood Wildlife

abstract.p: Enature Web site displays pictures of and gives details about the wildlife that inhabits any ZIP code; photo (S)

block.p: What were those tracks you saw in the dirt? At enature.com (www.enature.com), curious animal lovers can view field guides for any ZIP code. There are pictures and details about range and behavior for each mammal, bird, reptile and amphibian in the guide.

What were those tracks you saw in the dirt? At enature.com (www.enature.com), curious animal lovers can view field guides for any ZIP code. There are pictures and details about range and behavior for each mammal, bird, reptile and amphibian in the guide.

Some of the lists could use refinement. A ZIP code query for 10128, on Manhattan's east side, showed species like the white-tailed deer, which is rarely spotted on Park Avenue. To its credit, the field guide also included such present-day residents as the common raccoon, the Eastern gray squirrel and the Norway rat, which numbers in the thousands in New York.
SHELLY FREIERMAN
Browser A selection of events and sites on the Web.
Events
TODAY through July 28, 7 to 9 p.m. www.live.riffage.com
Tonight, it's Walter ''Wolfman'' Washington and the funky Meters, in the first of several live Webcasts from the New Orleans Jazz & Heritage Festival 2000.
TODAY, 8 p.m. chat.yahoo.com
Chat with Brooks Robinson, the Baseball Hall of Fame third baseman for the Baltimore Orioles, who played for 23 seasons and won the Golden Glove fielding award 16 times.
MONDAY, 11 p.m. www.comedyaudio.com
Webcast of a performance by the Duck's Breath Mystery Theater, on its 25th anniversary tour in Berkeley, Calif.
WEDNESDAY, noon www.webmd.com
A panel discussion on women and AIDS, from the 13th International AIDS Conference.
